ISSUE.TITLE: [BUG] [500] Internal Server Error, can't send file to PC
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Describe the bug almost the same issue, both version Localsend 1.7.0 and 1.9.1. 1 PC: win10 2 Android Smart Phones(Mi 10 Ultra & Mi Max 3) Both Android Phones can send/receive file to/from each other smoothly. PC can send file to 2 phones. Android Phones can't send file to PC. ### To reproduce 1. Go to '...' 2. Click on '...' 3. Scroll down to '...' 4. See error ### Expected behavior File should be sent as expected. ### Screenshots ![微信图片_20230510213449](https://github.com/localsend/localsend/assets/3594904/840b2373-1b51-4168-aadf-1f4a31536070) Debugging -> HTTP Logs cleaned and retried send text file, got this log ![微信图片_20230510225644](https://github.com/localsend/localsend/assets/3594904/64cee1e7-ba8a-4470-8ed7-262aeef831c5) ### Desktop (please complete the following information) _No response_ ### Smartphone (please complete the following information) - Device: Mi 10 Ultra - OS: MIUI 12.5.6 / Android 11 - Version: 1.7.0 / 1.9.1 ### Additional context _No response_
